critiques.subject: Architectural detail of a sculpted walrus head and decorative molding
critiques.mood: Stoic and whimsical, bathed in bright, hard daylight
preserve: The pastel color palette (blue accents and pink wall)
The distinct shadows cast by the tusks which provide depth
critiques.notes: This is a charming architectural detail shot that suffers primarily from a lack of critical sharpness, likely due to crop or lens limitations. Editing should focus on bringing out the tactile quality of the stone without introducing excessive noise artifacts.

improvements_detailed.action: Apply sharpening and structure
improvements_detailed.reason: The image appears soft with smoothed textures; sharpening will define the intricate carving details.

improvements_detailed.action: Increase texture and micro-contrast
improvements_detailed.reason: To accentuate the relief of the foliage and the weathering on the stone surface.

improvements_detailed.action: Reduce highlights
improvements_detailed.reason: To recover detail on the brightest parts of the walrus's forehead and tusks.

improvements_detailed.action: Correct vertical perspective
improvements_detailed.reason: The vertical lines (columns and window) are slightly converging; straightening aligns them with the frame.

context.subject: Architectural detail of a sculpted walrus head and decorative molding
context.mood: Stoic and whimsical, bathed in bright, hard daylight
preserve: The pastel color palette (blue accents and pink wall)
The distinct shadows cast by the tusks which provide depth

critiques.subject: Decorative walrus head relief with tusks on an ornate building facade
critiques.mood: quirky and sunlit, with strong graphic shadows
improvements: [MODERATE] Reduce highlights globally (Highlights -25 to -40) and pull Whites slightly (-10) to recover detail in the bright stonework, especially on the walrus head and tusks
[SUBTLE] Lift shadows selectively on the relief using a mask (Shadows +15 to +30) while keeping background shadows darker; add a small Blacks reduction (-5 to -10) to maintain contrast
[MODERATE] Refine composition with a tighter crop/straighten to reduce the left window area and emphasize symmetry around the walrus; aim to center the subject and remove empty margins
[SUBTLE] Neutralize color cast slightly (cool WB a touch or reduce Yellow saturation -5 to -10; optionally add Vibrance +5) and use HSL to tame the warm stone panel so it doesn't dominate
[SUBTLE] Apply targeted texture/clarity to the carved areas (Texture +10 to +20, Clarity +5) and light sharpening with masking (Amount ~50, Masking 70+)
preserve: The strong directional sunlight and shadow pattern
The natural pastel palette of the facade (cool blues vs warm stone)
critiques.notes: The image is technically solid with sharp focus and low noise, but the bright highlights on the stonework feel a bit hot in midday light. A highlight pull, selective shadow lift, and a tighter crop would improve texture, clarity of the relief, and overall visual emphasis while retaining the dramatic sunlit mood.

improvements_detailed.action: Reduce highlights globally (Highlights -25 to -40) and pull Whites slightly (-10) to recover detail in the bright stonework, especially on the walrus head and tusks
improvements_detailed.reason: The sunlit areas are close to clipping and look a bit harsh; highlight recovery will restore texture and improve perceived depth.

improvements_detailed.action: Lift shadows selectively on the relief using a mask (Shadows +15 to +30) while keeping background shadows darker; add a small Blacks reduction (-5 to -10) to maintain contrast
improvements_detailed.reason: Opens up carved details without flattening the dramatic lighting, improving readability of the ornamentation.

improvements_detailed.action: Refine composition with a tighter crop/straighten to reduce the left window area and emphasize symmetry around the walrus; aim to center the subject and remove empty margins
improvements_detailed.reason: The window frame on the left competes with the subject; a cleaner framing strengthens the graphic impact and directs attention to the relief.

improvements_detailed.action: Neutralize color cast slightly (cool WB a touch or reduce Yellow saturation -5 to -10; optionally add Vibrance +5) and use HSL to tame the warm stone panel so it doesn't dominate
improvements_detailed.reason: Balances the warm facade tones against the cooler blue background elements, making the subject feel more natural and cohesive.

improvements_detailed.action: Apply targeted texture/clarity to the carved areas (Texture +10 to +20, Clarity +5) and light sharpening with masking (Amount ~50, Masking 70+)
improvements_detailed.reason: Enhances fine sculptural detail while avoiding oversharpening flat surfaces and background edges.

context.subject: Decorative walrus head relief with tusks on an ornate building facade
context.mood: quirky and sunlit, with strong graphic shadows
preserve: The strong directional sunlight and shadow pattern
The natural pastel palette of the facade (cool blues vs warm stone)

critiques.subject: Ornate Art Nouveau elephant head sculpture on building facade
improvements: [MODERATE] Reduce highlights by -30 to -40 to recover detail in the cream-colored elephant sculpture and prevent washout
[SUBTLE] Apply graduated filter from top to darken upper architectural elements by -0.5 EV to balance exposure across frame
[MODERATE] Increase texture slider by +15 to +20 on the sculpture to enhance carved details and relief patterns
[SUBTLE] Shift white balance cooler by -200K to neutralize warm cast and better represent stone materials
preserve: Sharp focus throughout the frame
Architectural detail and decorative elements
Natural shadows that provide depth and dimensionality
critiques.notes: This is a well-composed architectural detail shot with excellent sharpness and clarity. The primary issue is slight overexposure in the midday sun that's washing out the sculptural details. By recovering highlights and enhancing texture, the ornate craftsmanship will be better showcased while maintaining the natural lighting character.

improvements_detailed.action: Reduce highlights by -30 to -40 to recover detail in the cream-colored elephant sculpture and prevent washout
improvements_detailed.reason: The elephant head and surrounding ornamental details are losing texture definition due to overexposure in bright sunlight

improvements_detailed.action: Apply graduated filter from top to darken upper architectural elements by -0.5 EV to balance exposure across frame
improvements_detailed.reason: Creates more even lighting distribution and draws focus to the central sculptural element

improvements_detailed.action: Increase texture slider by +15 to +20 on the sculpture to enhance carved details and relief patterns
improvements_detailed.reason: Emphasizes the intricate craftsmanship of the floral garlands and architectural ornamentation

improvements_detailed.action: Shift white balance cooler by -200K to neutralize warm cast and better represent stone materials
improvements_detailed.reason: Current warm tone makes stone appear yellowish rather than natural cream/limestone color
